results.title: Top Gardening Courses Online - Updated [March 2025]
results.description: Learn Gardening today: find your Gardening online course on Udemy.

results.title: Gardening 101: A Guide For Growing & Caring For Plants | Geraldine Lavin | Skillshare
results.description: A gardening class for everyone! No prior experience necessary - all you need is a desire to grow something useful, edible, beautiful, or for the birds.

results.title: Plants & Gardening Classes Online | Skillshare
results.description: Skillshare is a learning community for creators. Anyone can take an online class, watch video lessons, create projects, and even teach a class themselves.

results.title: Free Gardening Tutorial - Grow Your Greens | Udemy
results.description: Learn gardening essentials through 11 modules, downloadable texts and sheets, all you need to start your own garden! - Free Course.

results.title: Gardening basics for beginners | Udemy
results.description: This course is about creating flower beds and mixborders in some simple steps. All video tutorials with subtitles.

results.title: Practical Gardening | Udemy
results.description: Learning everything about gardening from grassroots level.

results.title: Indoor Gardening: Grow Houseplants, Veggies, and Herbs | Ekta Chaudhary | Skillshare
results.description: You don’t need a yard or even a patio to create a garden oasis in your home — just the know-how that YouTuber and scientist-turned-gardener Ekta Chaudhary provides.

results.title: The Beginner's Guide to Vegetable Gardening | Udemy
results.description: Learn where, when and what to plant in your backyard garden.

results.title: Gorgeous Garden Design (DIY Landscape Design You’ll Love) | Udemy
results.description: This is a beginner/intermediate level course in landscape Architecture and Design, covering essential objectives and principles for developing strong design solutions.

results.title: Embrace Eco-Friendly Living & Gardening
results.description: MasterClass gives you access to genius through online courses from the best in the world.

results.title: MasterClass | Ron Finley Teaches Gardening
results.description: Community activist and self-described “Gangster Gardener” Ron Finley teaches you the power of growing your own food and creating a thriving garden in any space.

results.title: How to Not Kill Your Plants | Ron Finley Teaches Gardening | MasterClass
results.description: Learn proper plant maintenance and how to diagnose common issues to develop your green thumb.

results.title: Grow Your Own Food: Greens & Legumes | Ron Finley Teaches Gardening | MasterClass
results.description: Learn how to grow greens and legumes, including kale and sugar snap peas.

results.title: Planting a Revolution | Ron Finley Teaches Gardening | MasterClass
results.description: Discover Ron’s story and the role of healthy food in community and personal empowerment through gardening.

results.title: Grow Your Own Food: Herbs | Ron Finley Teaches Gardening | MasterClass
results.description: Create your herb garden with Ron's guidance on maintaining a small space garden.
